Guardian:Gem_Cyan.NAME: Aquamarine
Guardian:Gem_Cyan.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Add a Ward to your hand.
Guardian:Gem_Cyan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Ward to your hand.

Guardian:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Guardian:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into Stasis. NL Tick - Gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Volatile.

Guardian:DonusPower.NAME: Ancient Attack
Guardian:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DecasProtection.NAME: Ancient Power
Guardian:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:FierceBash.NAME: Fierce Bash
Guardian:FierceBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Tick - Increase this card's damage by !M!.

Guardian:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Guardian:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Guardian:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
Guardian:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !GuardianMulti! times to ALL enemies.

Guardian:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
Guardian:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into Stasis. NL When this card would leave Stasis, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Volatile.

Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.NAME: Hyper Beam
Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Strength affects this card !M! times. NL Skip your next turn.

Guardian:FloatingOrbs.NAME: Floating Orbs
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Orb_Slam to your hand.
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an Orb_Slam to your hand.

Guardian:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
Guardian:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage every turn this combat.

Guardian:Orbwalk.NAME: Orbwalk
Guardian:Orbwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Tick - Gain 1 Strength. NL Volatile.
Guardian:Orbwalk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Tick - Gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:WalkerClaw.NAME: Walker Claw
Guardian:WalkerClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Strength affects this card !M! times.

Guardian:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Guardian:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, Block is not removed at the start of your turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:SentryBeam.NAME: Sentry Beam
Guardian:SentryBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Place a Sentry_Wave into Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Place an Upgraded Sentry_Wave into Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:SentryWave.NAME: Sentry Wave
Guardian:SentryWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw a card. NL Place a Sentry_Beam into Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Place an Upgraded Sentry_Beam into Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:CompilePackage.NAME: Compile Package
Guardian:CompilePackage.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:CompilePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. The cards the Package adds will all be Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageShapes.NAME: Package: Shapes
Guardian:PackageShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.NAME: Package: Ancients
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Attack, Ancient Power, and Ancient Construct to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Attack, Ancient Power, and Ancient Construct to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSphere.NAME: Package: Spheric
Guardian:PackageSphere.DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSphere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSentry.NAME: Package: Sentry
Guardian:PackageSentry.DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSentry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageWalker.NAME: Package: Orbwalker
Guardian:PackageWalker.DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageWalker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageAutomaton.NAME: Package: Bronze
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDefect.NAME: Package: Defect
Guardian:PackageDefect.DESCRIPTION: Add a Reroute, Preprogram, and Time Capacitor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDefect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Reroute, Preprogram, and Time Capacitor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Planning.NAME: Planning
Guardian:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Place the top !M! cards of your draw pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Recover.NAME: Recover
Guardian:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile into Stasis.
Guardian:Recover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place up to !M! cards from your discard pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
Guardian:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: Accelerate your right-most card in Stasis until it's turn counter reaches 0. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Clone.NAME: Clone
Guardian:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Place a copy of that card into Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Preprogram.NAME: Preprogram
Guardian:Preprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may choose one to place into Stasis.

Guardian:GemFinder.NAME: Gem Finder
Guardian:GemFinder.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, you may choose a Common Gem to add to your deck.

Guardian:StasisField.NAME: Stasis Field
Guardian:StasisField.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Place this card into Stasis.

Guardian:StasisStrike.NAME: Stasis Strike
Guardian:StasisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Place this card into Stasis.

Guardian:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Plans
Guardian:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.
Guardian:FuturePlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.

Guardian:Suspension.NAME: Suspension
Guardian:Suspension.DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand into Stasis.
Guardian:Suspension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Place a card in your hand into Stasis.

Guardian:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
Guardian:FastForward.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Accelerate all cards in Stasis twice.

Guardian:ConstructionForm.NAME: Construction Form
Guardian:ConstructionForm.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, you cannot lose HP or play Attacks.

Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.NAME: Spot Weakpoint
Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.DESCRIPTION: Whenever targeted enemy takes damage, gain 1 Momentary Strength. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RollAttack.NAME: Roll Attack
Guardian:RollAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage if you are in Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:GemFire.NAME: Gem Cannon
Guardian:GemFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Gems and cards with Gems in them in your hand. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Gem in those cards.

Guardian:ChargeCore.NAME: Charge Core
Guardian:ChargeCore.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then place this card into Stasis. NL Tick - Draw a card. NL Volatile.

Guardian:Reroute.NAME: Reroute
Guardian:Reroute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next non-Exhausting Attack or Skill you play this turn into Stasis.

Guardian:PiercingHide.NAME: Piercing Hide
Guardian:PiercingHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Momentary Thorns. NL Gain Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:ShieldSpikes.NAME: Shield Spikes
Guardian:ShieldSpikes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Momentary Thorns if you are in Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:PrismaticBeam.NAME: Prismatic Beam
Guardian:PrismaticBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.NAME: Prismatic Barrier
Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
Guardian:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage if you have a card in Stasis.

Guardian:TemporalShield.NAME: Temporal Shield
Guardian:TemporalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block if you have a card in Stasis.

Guardian:RefractedBeam.NAME: Refracted Beam
Guardian:RefractedBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Guardian:MultiBeam.NAME: Multi-Beam
Guardian:MultiBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X Times. NL Tick - Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.
Guardian:MultiBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X+1 Times. NL Tick - Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.

Guardian:BaubleBeam.NAME: Bauble Beam
Guardian:BaubleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Perform the following !M! times:

Guardian:PrimingBeam.NAME: Priming Beam
Guardian:PrimingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.

Guardian:EvasiveProtocol.NAME: Evasive Protocol
Guardian:EvasiveProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Dexterity while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain !M! Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:SpikerProtocol.NAME: Spiker Protocol
Guardian:SpikerProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Thorns while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain !M! Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:ArmoredProtocol.NAME: Armored Protocol
Guardian:ArmoredProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Block at the end of each turn while in Defensive_Mode. NL Gain !M! Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:TimeSifter.NAME: Time Sifter
Guardian:TimeSifter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis with a turn counter of 2 or more.

Guardian:AncientConstruct.NAME: Ancient Construct
Guardian:AncientConstruct.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain !M! Artifact and lose [E].

Guardian:CrystalBeam.NAME: Crystal Beam
Guardian:CrystalBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each Gem in ALL of your socketed cards.

Guardian:Gem_Synthetic.NAME: Onyx
Guardian:Gem_Synthetic.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Gain 1 Artifact. Lose 1 HP.

Guardian:Gem_Yellow.NAME: Amber
Guardian:Gem_Yellow.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis.
Guardian:Gem_Yellow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis.

Guardian:Gem_Purple.NAME: Amethyst
Guardian:Gem_Purple.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.
Guardian:Gem_Purple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.

Guardian:Gem_Crimson.NAME: Garnet
Guardian:Gem_Crimson.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.NAME: Fragmented Gem
Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Add a Shiv to your hand.
Guardian:Gem_Fragmented.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Shiv to your hand.

Guardian:Repulse.NAME: Repulsor
Guardian:Repulse.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the first Status or Curse drawn each turn.
Guardian:Repulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the first 2 Status or Curse cards drawn each turn.

Guardian:BronzeOrb.NAME: Bronze Orb
Guardian:BronzeOrb.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Place a random card from your draw pile into Stasis. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RevengeProtocol.NAME: Revenge Protocol
Guardian:RevengeProtocol.DESCRIPTION: When Defensive Mode is removed, gain 1 Strength for each turn it was active. NL Gain !M! Defensive_Mode.

Guardian:GatlingBeam.NAME: Gatling Beam
Guardian:GatlingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into Stasis. NL Tick - Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each time this Tick effect has triggered. NL Volatile.

Guardian:ShieldCharger.NAME: Shield Charger
Guardian:ShieldCharger.DESCRIPTION: Place this card into Stasis. NL Tick - Gain !B! Block and [E]. NL Volatile.

Guardian:StasisEngine.NAME: Stasis Engine
Guardian:StasisEngine.DESCRIPTION: For every 3rd 0-cost card you play, gain [E] and draw a card.
Guardian:StasisEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For every 3rd 0-cost card you play, gain [E] and draw a card.

Guardian:HammerDown.NAME: Hammer Down
Guardian:HammerDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double your Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:OmegaCannon.NAME: Omega Cannon
Guardian:OmegaCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each Strength you have.

Guardian:ModeShift.NAME: Mode Shift
Guardian:ModeShift.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Strength and Dexterity. NL Draw a card.
Guardian:ModeShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Swap your Strength and Dexterity. NL Draw a card.

Guardian:PackageConstruct.NAME: Package: Construct
Guardian:PackageConstruct.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hammer Down, Omega Cannon, and Mode Shift to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageConstruct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hammer Down, Omega Cannon, and Mode Shift to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageMass.NAME: Package: Mass
Guardian:PackageMass.DESCRIPTION: Add a Mass of Spikes, Mass of Bombs, and Group Slam to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageMass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Mass of Spikes, Mass of Bombs, and Group Slam to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:MassOfThorns.NAME: Mass Of Spikes
Guardian:MassOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Momentary Thorns. NL Exhaust if you have Artifact.

Guardian:MassTimeBomb.NAME: Mass Of Bombs
Guardian:MassTimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: In each empty Stasis slot, place a Time Bomb there. NL Exhaust if this created 2 or more Time Bombs.
Guardian:MassTimeBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In each empty Stasis slot, place an Upgraded Time Bomb there. NL Exhaust if this created 2 or more Time Bombs.

Guardian:MassSlam.NAME: Group Slam
Guardian:MassSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust if you have 3 or more Strength.
